DOC.brief_summary: This multicenter , randomize study subject heterozygous familial hypercholesterolemia receive highly effective statin assess safety , efficacy tolerability Bococizumab ( PF-04950615 ; RN316 ) low LDL-C .
DOC.brief_title: A 52 Week Study To Assess The Use Of Bococizumab ( PF-04950615 ; RN316 ) In Subjects With Heterozygous Familial Hypercholesterolemia
DOC.criteria: Treated statin . Fasting LDLC > 70 mg/dL triglyceride < =400 mg/dL . High high risk incur cardiovascular event . Heterozygous familial hypercholesterolemia . Pregnant breastfeeding female . Cardiovascular cerebrovascular event procedure past 30 day . Congestive heart failure NYHA class IV . Poorly control hypertension .
